name: Aegis Shield
description:
Deals nonlethal damage. @{attribute}{Relic} weapon associated with the @{ability}{Major Crest of Fraldarius||Minor Crest of Fraldarius}{Crest of Fraldarius} and the abilities @{ability}{Aegis} and @{ability}{Pavise}.

Has the @{attribute}{Structure: Buckler} attribute.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
